extendedInfo.description: Welcome!  If you're in search of truly caring, professional and talented hairstylists, in Phoenix, you just found them.  The stylists at Mozell & Company are multi-textural, multicultural haircare specialists.  All hair types are welcome and celebrated.  Our goal is to enhance and bring out the beauty in each and every client.  Whether you have straight hair, fine hair, relaxed hair, natural hair, transitional hair, or naturally curly hair; healthy, beautiful hair is what we do.  We can show you how to achieve the style you want while cultivating the healthy hair you need. Mozell & Company is located inside STUDIO 14 (suite 9) in Old Town Scottsdale. You will find the salon a warm and friendly environment offering the very best in personal care and comfort. Whether you need a simple cut or complete new look, we can help you find the style that suits you and your lifestyle.The following services are offered by appointment only:HaircutsColorFacial WaxingRelaxersTexturizersPravana Perfection SmoothOutConditioning TreatmentsBlowoutsShampoo/StylesNatural HaircareBraid Outs / Twist OutsPress n CurlExtensions/Hair Weave
